author: Farbod Salamat-Zadeh
comment: This is a nice, well designed watch face with useful customisation options. But notification text overlays the rest of the watch face in a strange way. I would also love more customisation options such as changing colour schemes
title: Great!

author: m v
comment: Looks nice but watch out for burn in on amoled screens. The ambient mode is prone to severe burn in. Keep it off !
title: Burn in issue

author: Tyler Smock
comment: If I could change colors that would be great! The customization is great but it's still lacking. Color options should have been given at the start, as I personally believe that every watch face should have color customization.

author: Jay Lloyd
comment: The watch face works perfect and looks fantastic on my LG Urbane! Would be nice to be able to customise the colours, I'd be willing to pay that as an extra feature hint hint!
title: Very pretty!

author: ziyi zhang
comment: Great animation and enough customization. I like your watch face as much as watch face of Ben. Good job!

author: Zachary Cocker
comment: Installed app but cannot find watch face anywhere. Using Moto 360 and Galaxy S7 carnt even find the app on my phone.

reply.author: DevEddy
reply.content: Hi! I'm sorry to hear that. Can you tell me what watch are you using, so I can look into it? Cheers!

author: Mark Rocha
comment: Love this watch face, simple and elegant. My only want however is for one of those circles to be a battery indicator. If you can add one in (or do something similar), it would be a complete package.

author: Dez Tessler
comment: I keep coming back to this face! It's very slick, solid, and just plain looking amazing. Can't wait for the mentioned customisation options.
title: My FAVOURITE!

author: steve rowlands
comment: Would love the option to change the colours as the flat tyre is very prominent on the motor 360. Cheers
title: Great...but

author: Andrew James Hamilton
comment: Great design, bit of Colour customisation would be absolutely fantastic but I can imagine a future update making this possible so still five star

author: Leon Barton
comment: I would probably like this if I could set the colours. In its current state I will not be using it.
title: Really need some colour options

author: Omg ItsPandaGuys
comment: Hey does anyone here know actually how to set it up on your gear...? It doesnt show on my gear clocks settings...
title: Need help

author: Ross Osuilleabhain
comment: Doesn't work with gear 2 neo

author: Owen McGinley
comment: Awesome free watchface, however the date option should have more options pertaining to users in the US.
title: Great watchface

author: Daniel Grible
comment: Great idea, complete lack of customization.
title: Lack of variation is lazy

author: Uwe Klockmann
comment: Something different, but still easy tot read the time. Well done
title: Nice

author: Lech Deregowski
comment: I only wish there were more customization options.
title: Nice and clean

author: Alex Boutros
comment: Any idea how to use this on the gear s2?

author: Fan Hao
comment: Very beautiful on lg g r. Thanks
title: Beautiful

author: Artem Strizhevski
comment: Nice app. May be nice to have some colour customization.
title: Nice app.

author: Memo Hernandez Ortega
comment: Wish I could make a donation!
title: Beautiful!

author: Javier Correa
comment: Love it! Never had an issue with it :D

author: zs z
comment: I hope to change color
title: good

author: Clifton M
comment: Nice, simple, and looks great out of the box

author: Rich Szczepanski
comment: Edit - Fixed, no complaints!

reply.author: DevEddy
reply.content:
Hi,
Thanks for trying out the watchface. Now it should work on any smartwatch.
Enjoy!

author: Chris O'Kane
comment: Change colours would be nice

author: Patrick J. Smith
comment: Looks great!

author: Satish Yadav
comment: Minimalistic and awesome.

author: khemchand parewa
comment: Good wach

author: Jacky Lai
comment: Very nice

author: Refael Botbol
comment: Simple and work

author: Ted Voltolina
comment: Updating my previous review regarding poor battery life. Tried it again for two days, and battery life is back where it should be. I'm not sure if any changes were made to the watch face since I last tried it -- maybe my issue was just a fluke.  It would be nice if there was a pro version for a couple of bucks that added some more customizations, like color schemes, thickness of the rings, fonts, and the ability to add widgets like weather, Fit data, etc. I'd buy it.  Nexus 5 + G Watch R
title: Beautiful and very functional

author: Joey Sack
comment: I think this is the coolest and cleanest watch look for my Moto 360. It Is beautiful, the only thing that would make it better is if you could change the color but the blue is still awesome. It's weird that the Moto 360 in the picture slideshow doesn't have a " flat tire" bar for the sensor.
title: Really good looking

author: Ruud Griepsma
comment: On oled screens you can see the circles for minutes and hours are starting to burn in the screen after a while. Luckily the effect is gone after a few minutes but I think eventually it may stay. Would be nice if in ambient mode the circles are thinner and less bright to avoid this.
title: Very nice but screen burns in

author: Mike Cutmore
comment: Like the concept, but because of the circles, it over emphasised the black bar on my moto 360 since the outer seconds & minutes rings are completely masked by it. First time I've been overly aware of the watch's flat tyre is with this face. Also the centre digits seemed not quite exactly horizontally lined up level. An illusion, or perhaps my moto 360 module isn't exactly level in its housing. Again, only noticeable with this face.
title: Novel

author: Kenton Devine
comment: I used this face for my go to since I got my smartwatch. After the last update the day and date are not within the circles any more. The circles overlap the date so it is not very legible.

reply.author: DevEddy
reply.content:
Hi,
The watchface should work now on any smartwatch.
Enjoy!

title: Used to be perfect

author: Dark Jaguar
comment: I love how well it fits the "Wear" aesthetic, better than Google's default.  It looks lovely on my Moto 360.  Google finally made a face with date, but "Streetart" doesn't look nearly as clean as this and is harder to read.  Ambient support is much appreciated!  I'd love to see a few more things like am/pm label next to time, yet more date display options, an in-watch option menu, and (from Streetart) auto adjusting time/date display that moves up and down when cards come in.  Google, hire this vampire!
title: Best looking, steadily improving

author: Mark Luna
comment: The time doesn't fit within the circle on square watches. Only issue and hope there's some fix for that if possible.

reply.author: DevEddy
reply.content:
Hi,
The watchface should work now on any smartwatch.
Enjoy!

title: Doesn't fit square watch

author: Matt Berra
comment: I love setting this as my face whenever I get off work. Feels like a default watch face from Moto. Really elegant yet casual enough, and simple to read. Love it.
title: Great casual face

author: Michael Beattie
comment: Everything is overlapping, and options are sparse. Uninstalling now.

reply.author: DevEddy
reply.content:
Hi,
Thanks for trying out the watchface. Now it should work on any smartwatch.
Enjoy!

title: Sony Smartwatch 3
